title: Unable to connect to server
body: Everytime i go into a game or try to at least it says unable to connect to server and then i get a penalty for it. its not fair that i get penaltys these bugs i have tried 3 different computers and it still doesnt work. please fix these bugs riot its not fair.

replies.body: Constantly getting disconnected and not being able to get reconnected could be a pretty good sign that something isn't configured in the best way for your network to connect to our servers, or something might actually be blocking it outright. Checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure to adjust your firewalls to allow League's connection through, but hit me back up if that doesn't help too much.
